ItemDesc: A simple equation. When entered into the Omni-Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
ItemBGDesc: A recipe that Wen Shiling created by accident. Small amounts of experimental data shows this can consistently produce All Good Potions. This recipe is yet to be used in large-scale production.\n\n"This recipe is only to be used by Shiling and her friends. If anyone else were to use it, I am not accountable for the product's effects!"
